{\footnotesize\ttfamily \hyperlink{structmetal__mutex__t}{metal\+\_\+mutex\+\_\+t}$\ast$ metal\+\_\+condition\+::m}

mutex. The condition variable is attached to this mutex when it is waiting. It is also used to check correctness in case there are multiple waiters. \mbox{\Hypertarget{structmetal__condition_af8373265030f4b57ea2670797ff0adad}\label{structmetal__condition_af8373265030f4b57ea2670797ff0adad}}
